mapper.insert: insert into AECMemberInfo (memberID, memberPWD, CNname, EGname, wechatName, wechatID, memberScore, active) values (#{memberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{egname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update AECMemberInfo set memberPWD = #{memberpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNname = #{cnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EGname = #{egname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechatName = #{wechatname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechatID = #{wechatid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memberScore = #{memberscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER} where memberID = #{memberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select memberID, memberPWD, CNname, EGname, wechatName, wechatID, memberScore, active from AECMemberInfo
